name: cypress-up-skill
description: A demo project for end to end test using cypress

scripts.clean-reports: if exist cypress\reports rmdir /s/q cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mochawesome
scripts.generate-report: npm run combine-reports && marge cypress/reports/mochawesome/report.json -f report -o cypress/reports/mochawesome --charts true --autoOpen true
scripts.test: npm run clean-reports && npm run cy:run-tests

author: Vlad Mocan
